column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: The Wouche Away Prebiotic Total Body Cleanser and Mist comes well packaged. I tested the sensitive skin variety as well as the regular one -- both are gentle. They come in a giftable burlap pouch containing the products along with small cloths. I enjoy using this product. It does an efficient job cleansing my skin using good ingredients. They're cool and soothing and leave me feeling refreshed. I appreciate the travel size offering. It's perfect for personal hygiene while away from home and it packs easily in my travel bag.

column6: Easy to use on the go
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: This is great for travel, it's easy to use on the go. I used it while staying at my parent's house and it is mild and gentle. Didn't bother my sensitive skin at all. Left me feeling fresh and clean. The little reusable wipes are nice to have too. This is small enough to tuck into your travel bag, purse, backpack or even jacket pocket if need be. Discreet and private.

column14: This comes packaged so perfectly that it’s easy to carry. It is easy to use, non irritating and effective. It did very well at leaving me feeling fresh and clean. It’s the perfect size to drop in your purse and use it daily. Either at work or while out running your daily errands.

column14: This is a small set of travel size cleaners.  I gave this to my husband to take with him on his business trips.  He says it works well, much better than what is provided in the hotels.  Luckily a little does go a long way, but it lasted him two trips.  He likes it so much I will be getting more!
